Arc Lightning.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] The bounce range of Shock Pulse is increased by {scale=12|12}%

Astral Traveler.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Gain {scale=25|25}% additional Movement Speed during Ghost Walk.

Conduit.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Gain {scale=6|6}% movement speed for 3s if Shock Pulse hits an enemy.

Crackle.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the Duration of Healing Totem by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Gale.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Ghost Walk lowers the cooldown of Healing Totem by {scale=1|1}s when Activated.

Haunting.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Reduces the cooldown of Ghost Walk by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Healing Rain.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Allies inside your Healing Totem are healed for {scale=1|1}% of their maximum Health per second.

Lightning Rod.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Hitting a champion with Shock Pulse heals for {scale=30|30}.

Maelstrom.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Your Weapon Shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse by 0.5s and Shock Pulse bounces 4 more times.

Monolith Totem.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the Health of Healing Totem by {scale=250|250}.

Outreach.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the area of Healing Totem by {scale=25|25}%

Phantom.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Increase the duration of Ghost Walk by {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Shamanic Might.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=100|100}.

Spirit's Domain.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Your Lightning Staff now also heals allies for 900 health a second.

Thunderstruck.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Recharge {scale=6|6}% of your ammo for every unique enemy hit by Shock Pulse.

Totemic Rescue.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 30% of your max Health grants you a {scale=200|200} Health Shield for 4s.

Totemic Ward.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Allies healed by Healing Totem receive CC Immunity for 2s and Healing Totem heals for 30% more.

Astralreisender.card_desc: [Geistergang] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Geistergang um weitere {scale=25|25}%.

Blitzableiter.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Triffst du einen Champion mit Schockimpuls, wirst du {scale=30|30} LP geheilt.

Blitzeinschlag.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Pro mit Schockimpuls getroffenem Gegner wird deine Munition um {scale=6|6}% aufgeladen.

Bogenblitz.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Erhöht die Sprungreichweite von Schockimpuls um {scale=12|12}%.

Geisterreich.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Der Blitzstab heilt Verbündete nun 900 LP pro Sekunde.

Heilregen.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Verbündete innerhalb deines Heiltotems werden pro Sekunde um {scale=1|1}% ihrer maximalen Gesundheit geheilt.

Knistern.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Erhöht die Dauer von Heiltotem um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Mahlstrom.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Deine Waffenschüsse reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Schockimpuls um 0,5s und Schockimpuls springt noch 4-mal hin und her.

Phantom.card_desc: [Geistergang] Erhöht die Dauer von Geistergang um {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Reichweite.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Vergrößert den Bereich von Heiltotem um {scale=25|25}%.

Schamanische Macht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=100|100} LP.

Schocktherapie.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Treffer mit Schockimpuls erhöhen dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=6|6}%.

Sch\u00fctzendes Totem.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Von Heiltotem geheilte Verbündete sind 2s lang immun gegen CC-Effekte. Die Heilung von Heiltotem erhöht sich um 30%.

Spuken.card_desc: [Geistergang] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Geistergang um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Sturmwind.card_desc: [Geistergang] Die Aktivierung von Geistergang reduziert die Abklingzeit von Heiltotem um {scale=1|1}s.

Totemrettung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du unter 30% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, erhältst du 4s lang einen Schild mit {scale=200|200} LP.

Arc \u00e9lectrique.card_desc: [Choc électrique] La portée de rebond de Choc électrique augmente de {scale=12|12}%.

Bourrasque.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale réduit le temps de recharge du Totem de soin de {scale=1|1}s.

Conduit.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Choc électrique augmente votre vitesse de {scale=6|6}% s'il atteint un ennemi.

Cr\u00e9pitement.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

Domaine spirituel.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Le Bâton de foudre rend 900 PV par seconde aux alliés.

\u00c9lectrostatique.card_desc: [Arme] La vitesse de régénération des munitions augmente de {scale=12|12}%.

Fantomatique.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Fant\u00f4me.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale dure {scale=0.3|0.3}s de plus.

Foudroy\u00e9.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Choc électrique vous redonne {scale=6|6}% de vos munitions par ennemi touché.

Maelstr\u00f6m.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Vos tirs d'arme réduisent de 0,5s le temps de recharge de Choc électrique, qui rebondit 4 fois de plus.

Paratonnerre.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Toucher un champion avec Choc électrique vous redonne {scale=30|30} PV.

Pluie de soin.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin rend aussi {scale=1|1}% des PV max. par seconde aux alliés.

Protection tot\u00e9mique.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin rend 30% de PV de plus et rend les alliés immunisés aux contrôles pendant 2s.

Rayonnement.card_desc: [Totem de soin] La portée de Totem de soin augmente de {scale=25|25}%.

Secours tot\u00e9mique.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en-dessous de 30% de PV donne un bouclier de {scale=200|200} PV pendant 4s.

Seigneur de la foudre.card_desc: [Arme] Vous avez {scale=10|10}% de munitions de plus.

Totem monolithique.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Le Totem de soin a {scale=250|250} PV de plus.

Voyageur astral.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale augmente votre vitesse de {scale=25|25}% supplémentaires.

\u51c0\u5316\u4e4b\u98ce.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 灵魂行走激活时减少你治疗图腾的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u53e4\u65e7\u56fe\u817e.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 增加治疗图腾的持续时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u56fe\u817e\u6025\u6551.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于30%时，你将获得一个{scale=200|200}生命值的护盾，持续4秒

\u56fe\u817e\u7ed3\u754c.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 被治疗图腾治疗的友军会获得2秒的免疫控制效果，且治疗图腾的治疗效果提高40%

\u5e7b\u5f71.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 增加灵魂行走的持续时间{scale=0.3|0.3}秒

\u5f27\u5f62\u95ea\u7535.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击的弹射范围增加{scale=12|12}%

\u6069\u6cfd\u4f17\u751f.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾的作用半径增加{scale=10|10}%

\u661f\u754c\u65c5\u8005.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 技能激活时获得{scale=25|25}%额外的移动速度

\u6cbb\u7597\u4e4b\u96e8.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 在图腾范围内的友军每秒回复最大生命值的{scale=1|1}%

\u7075\u57df.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾可以在一定距离施放，且范围内满血队友获得的治疗量会转化为护盾。

\u7535\u80fd\u4f20\u5bfc.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击命中一个敌方英雄, 会使你获得{scale=6|6}%的移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u78d0\u77f3\u56fe\u817e.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾的生命值增加{scale=250|250}点

\u8428\u6ee1\u610f\u5fd7.card_desc: [护甲] 增加你的基础生命值上限{scale=100|100}

\u95ea\u7535\u4e4b\u6756.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击命中敌方英雄都会使你获得{scale=30|30}点治疗

\u95ea\u7535\u6f29\u6da1.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 每当普通攻击造成伤害时，震荡冲击的冷却时间降低0.3秒。闪电冲击的弹跳次数提高4次

\u96f7\u51fb.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击每命中一个不同的敌人，回复{scale=6|6}%武器能量

\u9759\u7535\u611f\u5e94.card_desc: [武器] 武器能量回复速度提高{scale=12|12}%

\u9b3c\u5f71\u68ee\u68ee.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 减少灵魂行走的冷却时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

Arc Lightning.card_desc: [Chain Lightning] You may target your Healing Totem with Chain lightning and also increase the bounce range by 10%.

Astral Traveler.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Gain 25% additional Movement Speed during Ghost Walk.

Conduit.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] For every 400 damage enemies take during Shock Pulse spawn an HP drop that heals for 100.

Crackle.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Those affected take 4 less damage per hit.

Electrostatic.card_desc: [Totemic Ward] Totemic Ward releases a pulse every {4}s that reveals Stealthed enemies within 40 units.

Gale.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Targets affected by Healing Totem reduce Crowd Control by 25%

Hamstring.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Weapon attacks slow enemies by 10% for 2s.

Healing Rain.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Your Healing totem Heals for an additional +1.5% of the recipient's maximum Health per second.

Lightning Rod.card_desc: [Chain Lightning] Your weapon hits turn enemies into a lightning rod. Chain Lightning bounced off these targets deals {25}% more damage

Monolith Totem.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase your Healing Totem Health by 500 and reduce the damage it takes by 5%.

Outreach.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the radius of Healing Totem by 20%.

Phantom.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Increase the duration of Ghost Walk by 1s and reduce the Cooldown by 5s.

Shamanic Might.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by 75.

Thunderlord.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon can fire {5}% longer before overheating.

Thunderstruck.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting a stealth target with your weapon reveals it for 1s.

Totemic Rescue.card_desc: [Armor] When your Health is reduced below 30%, you place a Healing Totem at your feet and gain 40% Movement Speed for 4s

Conducto.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Ganas un {scale=6|6}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 3s si Pulso de choque alcanza un enemigo.

Crujido.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] La duración de Tótem curativo aumenta en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Custodia tot\u00e9mica.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Los aliados afectados por Tótem curativo reciben inmunidad a CM durante 2s y cura un 30% más.

Dominio del Esp\u00edritu.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Bastón luminoso ahora también cura aliados 900 PS por segundo.

Estupefacci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Recarga un {scale=6|6}% de tu munición por cada enemigo único que alcances con Pulso de choque.

Et\u00e9reo.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Su recarga se reduce en {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Extensi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Su área de efecto aumenta {scale=25|25}%.

Fantasma.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Su duración aumenta en {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Fuerza cham\u00e1nica.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud base máxima aumenta en {scale=100|100} PS.

Lluvia curadora.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Los aliados dentro de su AdE se curan un {scale=1|1}% de su salud máxima por segundo.

Pararrayos.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Al alcanzar a un campeón con Pulso de choque, se cura {scale=30|30} PS.

Rayo de arco.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] El alcance del rebote aumenta un {scale=12|12}%.

Rescate tot\u00e9mico.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tu salud máxima está por debajo del 30 %, obtienes un escudo de {scale=200|200} PS durante 4 s.

T\u00f3tem monolito.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Su salud aumenta en {scale=250|250} puntos.

Ventarr\u00f3n.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Reduce la recarga de Tótem curativo en {scale=1|1} s cuando se activa.

Viajero astral.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Ganas un {scale=25|25}% más de velocidad de movimiento mientras dura Paso fantasma.

Vor\u00e1gine.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Los disparos de tu arma reducen la recarga de Pulso de choque en 0,5s y rebota 4 veces más.

Alcance.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta em {scale=25|25}% a área de alcance do Totem Curativo.

Assombra\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Reduz o intervalo do Passo Fantasma em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Chuva Curativa.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aliados na área do Totem Curativo são curados em {scale=1|1}% de suas vidas máximas por segundo.

Corrente El\u00e9trica.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Os disparos do seu Cajado reduzem o intervalo do Pulso Elétrico em 0,5s e o Pulso Elétrico ricocheteia mais 4 vezes.

Dom\u00ednio do Esp\u00edrito.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Seu Cajado de Raios agora também cura aliados em 900 de vida por segundo.

Eletrificado.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Ganha {scale=6|6}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s se o Pulso Elétrico acertar um inimigo.

Fa\u00edsca.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta em {scale=0.6|0.6}s a duração do Totem Curativo.

Fantasma.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Aumenta a duração do Passo Fantasma em {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

For\u00e7a Xam\u00e2nica.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima base em {scale=100|100}.

Fulminado.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Recarrega {scale=6|6}% de munição para cada inimigo único atingido pelo Pulso Elétrico.

Para-raios.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Cura você em {scale=30|30} ao atingir um Campeão com o Pulso Elétrico.

Rel\u00e2mpago em Arco.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] A área de ricochete do Pulso Elétrico aumenta em {scale=12|12}%.

Resgate Tot\u00eamico.card_desc: [Armadura] Quando abaixo de 30% da sua vida máxima, concede um escudo com {scale=200|200} de vida por 4s.

Totem Mon\u00f3lito.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta a vida do Totem Curativo em {scale=250|250}.

Ventania.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Quando ativado o Passo Fantasma, reduz em {scale=1|1}s o intervalo do Totem Curativo.

Viajante astral.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Ganha {scale=25|25}% de velocidade de movimento adicional durante Passo Fantasma.

Vigia Tot\u00eamico.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aliados curados pelo Totem Curativo recebem imunidade a controle coletivo por 2s e o Totem cura 30% mais.

\u0410\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Во время действия Призрачной походки ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=25|25}%.

\u0412\u0438\u0445\u0440\u044c.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Выстрелы из оружия сокращают перезарядку Электроимпульса на 0,5 с. Он отскакивает еще 4 раза.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043e\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Попадание по чемпиону Электроимпульсом исцеляет вас на {scale=30|30} ед.

\u0418\u0441\u0446\u0435\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Союзники в области действия Исцеляющего тотема исцеляются на {scale=1|1}% от их максимального здоровья в секунду.

\u041a\u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Попадание по врагу Электроимпульсом увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=6|6}% на 3 с.

\u041c\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Исцеляющий тотем становится на {scale=250|250} ед. прочнее.

\u041c\u043e\u0449\u044c \u0448\u0430\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное базовое здоровье увеличивается на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041e\u0445\u0432\u0430\u0442.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Область действия Исцеляющего тотема увеличивается на {scale=25|25}%.

\u0422\u0435\u0440\u0440\u0438\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Посох молний исцеляет союзников на 900 ед. в секунду.

\u0422\u043e\u0442\u0435\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 30% от максимального, вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=200|200} ед. на 4 с.
[Исцеляющий тотем] Исцеленные тотемом союзники получают иммунитет к эффектам контроля на 2 с. и 30% бонусного исцеления от тотема.

\u0422\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043a.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Длительность действия Исцеляющего тотема увеличивается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0423\u0434\u0430\u0440 \u0433\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Вы перезаряжаете оружие на {scale=6|6}% быстрее за каждого нового врага, пораженного Электроимпульсом.

\u0424\u0430\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Длительность Призрачной походки увеличивается на {scale=0.3|0.3} с.

\u0428\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043c.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Активация Призрачной походки сокращает перезарядку Исцеляющего тотема на {scale=1|1} с.

\u042f\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Перезарядка Призрачной походки сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

Gwiezdny podr\u00f3\u017cnik.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Podążając Ścieżką duchów, zyskujesz {scale=25|25}% zwiększenia szybkości ruchu.

Kamienny totem.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Zwiększa odporność Totemu leczniczego o {scale=250|250} pkt.

Kana\u0142.card_desc: [Porażenie] Udane trafienie wroga Porażeniem zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=6|6}% na 3 s.

Kr\u00f3lestwo duch\u00f3w.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Twój Kostur błyskawic przywraca sojusznikom 900 PZ na sekundę.

Leczniczy deszcz.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Sojusznicy wewnątrz Totemu odzyskują {scale=1|1}% maks. zdrowia na sekundę.

Moc szamana.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=100|100} PZ.

Nawiedzenie.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Skraca czas odnowienia Ścieżki duchów o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Totemiczny ratunek.card_desc: [Pancerz] Jeśli twoja wartość PZ spadnie poniżej 30%, zyskujesz na 4 s. tarczę o odporności {scale=200|200} pkt.

Trafienie gromu.card_desc: [Porażenie] Każde trafienie unikatowego wroga Porażeniem przywraca {scale=6|6}% amunicji.

Trzask.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Wydłuża czas trwania Totemu leczniczego o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Wiatr.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Aktywacja Ścieżki duchów skraca czas odnowienia Totemu leczniczego o {scale=1|1} .

Widmo.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Ścieżka duchów trwa o {scale=0.3|0.3} s dłużej.

Wir.card_desc: [Porażenie] Strzały z broni skracają czas odnowienia Porażenia o 0,5 s, a Porażenie odbija się dodatkowe 4 razy.

Zasi\u0119g.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Zwiększa zasięg Totemu leczniczego o {scale=25|25}%.

Zasi\u0119g totemu.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Sojusznicy uleczeni przez Totem otrzymują 2 s odporności na efekty Kontroli tłumu, a sam Totem leczy o 30% więcej PZ.

Astral Seyahat.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü sırasında %{scale=25|25} ek Hareket Hızı kazan.

Bora.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü, etkinleştirildiğinde İyileştirici Totem'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

C\u0131z\u0131rda.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totem'in Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn artır.

Girdap.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Silah Atışların, Şok Darbesi'nin bekleme süresini 0,5 sn azaltır ve Şok Darbesi 4 defa daha sıçrar.

G\u00f6zc\u00fc Totem.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totemin iyileştirdiği Müttefikler, 2 sn boyunca KK Bağışıklığı alır ve İyileştirici Totem, %30 daha fazla iyileştirir.

Hayalet.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü'nün süresini {scale=0.3|0.3} sn artır.

\u0130letken.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi bir düşmana isabet ederse 3 sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} Hareket Hızı kazanırsın.

Musallat.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü'nün Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn azaltır.

Paratoner.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Bir şampiyonu Şok Darbesi ile vurmak seni {scale=30|30} Can iyileştirir.

Ruhun Topraklar\u0131.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] Yıldırım Asası artık müttefikleri de saniyede 900 Can iyileştiriyor.

Seken Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi'nin sekme menzili %{scale=12|12} artar.

\u015eifal\u0131 Ya\u011fmur.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totem'inin içerisindeki müttefikler saniyede maksimum Canlarının %{scale=1|1} kadarı iyileşir.

Totem Kurtar\u0131\u015f\u0131.card_desc: [Zırh] Maksimum Canının %30'unun altına düştüğünde 4 sn boyunca {scale=200|200} Canı olan bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m \u00c7arpmas\u01.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi ile her farklı düşmana yapılan vuruş başına cephanenin %{scale=6|6} kadarı dolar.
